inventory.commentary: Contains duplicate mappings for WN Sense 1

sense.name: Make more completely physically visible.
sense.examples: John bared his arms before reaching into the fish tank. The loggers bared the insides of the forest. She bared her breasts and demanded to be heard.

sense.name: Make something public.
sense.examples: She bared her true feelings for David. The campaign bared plans for the upcoming election. He bared his soul for all to see.
